Technology Crossover Ventures

Technology Crossover Ventures (TCV) is a leading growth equity investor partnering with exceptional technology companies globally. Their focus is on building category-defining businesses, providing resources and expertise to fuel long-term growth and market leadership.

Offices: Menlo Park (United States), New York (United States), London (United Kingdom), Melbourne (Australia)

Investment Stages: Series B, Series C, Series D

Markets: Technology

Founded Year: 1995

Investor Type: Growth Equity
